thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Stylish Accessory for TVs and Monitors (WGH-4507)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Stylish Accessory for TVs and Monitors (WGH-4507) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Stylish Accessory for TVs and Monitors (WGH-4507)
text:
InventHelp, founded in 1984 in Pittsburgh, is submitting the TV / MONITOR WRAP to applicable companies for review.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 26, 2015
"I noticed that all flat-screen TVs have a black frame," said an inventor from Shadyside, Ohio. "Oftentimes, the black frame does not match the decor of the room in which the TV is placed. I came up with this idea so that you can match your TV to the decor of any room."
He created a prototype for the TV / MONITOR WRAP to change the appearance of a conventional flat-screen television or computer monitor. The accessory ensures that the TV or monitor matches the surrounding decor. This prevents the TV or monitor from standing out or being an eyesore. The unit helps tie the room together in a pleasing fashion. Furthermore, it features a stylish, decorative design.
The original design was submitted to the Pittsburgh office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-WGH-4507, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
# # #
